name: GGJ19 - My Neighbour the Vampire
description:
Play Length: ~10-15minutes per playthough
Made at Global Game Jam ( https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/my-neighbour-vampire )

You've just moved into a new neighborhood when all of a sudden, a vampire invasion is unleashed. You're not sure you can even trust your own parents but you have to be welcoming and throw a party for your new neighbors anyways. Be careful who you invite though. One wrong guest and you could be vampire chow. Invite no guests and your party will be no fun. Who will you choose?

A fun and silly visual novel.
*Contains Gordon Ramsy foul language, violence, and a pickle-hotdog. Player discretion is advised*

Credits:

Sean Brown - Writing, Programming

Owen McManus - Art

Stephen Ma - Writing, Programming

Evan Kawa - Programming, Editing

Alex Bymoen - Writing, Design

and Sarah Cline - Writing, Design

"Additional VO"

Rose C, Alexei P.
